forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds ESE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds ESE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 5C. SSW winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 42F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 8C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 46F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near -0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 41F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 34F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 39F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening changing over to snow overnight. Low around -0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening mixing with and changing to steady snow overnight. Low 31F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 34F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 2C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low near 35F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
